summary: Senior Product Manager with deep expertise in **AI-driven products** across B2C and B2B, currently leading AI initiatives at Justdial.
Proven track record of driving large-scale product growth, managing **100M+ monthly organic traffic** through strategic SEO, AEO/GEO, and data-driven funnel optimization.
Technical PM capable of bridging the gap between business goals and engineering, with hands-on experience in **LLMs, Agentic AI, and Python**.
Successful history of delivering complex **omnichannel and logistics solutions** for global brands including Swiggy, Nykaa, and Skechers.

experience.role: Sr. Product Manager - AI and Growth Initiatives

Owned JD Shopping fulfillment flows and led early-stage growth for JD Mart (B2B marketplace).
Led omnichannel and OMS platforms, driving zero-to-one product builds and large-scale retail transformations.
Acted as the bridge between clients and engineering teams, translating business requirements into product-ready specifications and client-specific solutions.

rolesDetails.role: Sr. Product Manager - AI and Growth Initiatives
points: Owning and scaling **Justdial‚Äôs AI platform** across Voice, LLMs, RAG, and agentic workflows to drive growth, operational efficiency, and AI-native discovery.
Spearheaded **Voice AI** initiatives, delivering **‚Çπ3Cr+ in annual cost savings** and driving a **15% increase in sales appointment bookings**, directly impacting topline revenue.
Developing a proprietary **Model Context Protocol (MCP)** to integrate with frontier LLMs, enabling Justdial content and actions to be surfaced and driven from AI platforms.

Led speech analytics solutions across sales, customer support, QA, spam detection, and competitor intelligence, analyzing **15k+ calls per day**, resulting in **‚Çπ4Cr+ annual cost savings** and generating **~9k qualified leads per day**.
Leading **GEO and AEO initiatives** to optimize Justdial for AI platforms, enabling **5M+ daily AI crawls** and driving **~1M monthly traffic** from LLM-based discovery channels.
Shipped **Ask Anything** AI agent for Justdial, enabling users to ask complex, cross-category queries through a conversational interface.
Built **RAG-based knowledge systems** for HR and customer support, eliminating **~80% of repeated HR queries** and **~60% of repetitive CS queries**.
Enriched **2L+ products** by deploying a pipeline combining **RAG and LLM outputs**, significantly improving content quality and search relevance.
Owned cross-platform **growth strategy** across web and mobile platforms to scale user traffic and leads on Justdial.
Orchestrated **SEO Revamp 2.0**, delivering **35% YoY organic traffic growth** and scaling the platform to **6M+ daily visits**.
Launched **multilingual pages** across **6 regional languages**, driving **5M+ monthly organic traffic** through automated translation workflows.
Partnered with marketing to improve **performance marketing efficiency**, reducing **CAC by 18%** through better audience targeting and landing page relevance.
Implemented **data analytics pipelines** using **GA4** and internal analytics systems to track real-time user behavior and improve retention insights.
Recognized with the **Top Impactor Award** for delivering high-impact growth initiatives.
Built and owned **order fulfillment** flows for JD Shopping, and later led JD Mart (B2B marketplace) through its early-stage growth and scale-up.
Introduced **non-regional B2B Results pages** and added auto-generated catalogues, seller videos, and dynamic Q&As, resulting in a **100% increase** in results page user visits via Google.
Added **lead generating avenues** on pages contributing to a **50% increase** in click on lead CTAs.
Launched **JD Shopping**, an open quick commerce platform empowering local retailers to sell online.
Led 5+ logistics **partner integrations** from scratch and built a multi-LSP order allocation engine for optimized fulfillment.
Led the **Omnichannel Order and Inventory Management** platforms, enabling real-time stock sync across 15+ marketplaces (Amazon, Flipkart, Myntra).
Owned the **0->1** build of Vin OMS 2.0, shaping vision, architecture, and roadmap to deliver a modular, standalone OMS serving as the central orchestration layer for unified commerce.
Optimized **Order Routing Algorithms** to automatically assign orders to the nearest warehouse, reducing shipping costs and delivery times by 20%.
Worked closely with clients like **Skechers and Swiggy Instamart** to gather requirements and built custom integrations for their specific logistics workflows.
Conducted extensive **Gap Analysis** for enterprise clients migrating to SaaS-based OMS/WMS solutions.
Documented detailed **BRDs (Business Requirement Documents)**, bridging the communication gap between business stakeholders and technical teams.
Facilitated **UAT (User Acceptance Testing)** phases for major deployments, ensuring zero critical bugs upon go-live.
Assisted in the **Pre-sales** process by creating product demos and proof-of-concept workflows for potential enterprise leads.

mantra: Every curious question deserves a clear answer. By digging deeper, we build better.

projectShowcase.title: Draftly - AI Writing Copilot
projectShowcase.description: A context-aware writing and reply assistant that transforms selected text into clear writing, smart replies, and structured work artifacts ‚Äî designed with intent-based actions, natural language control, and human-first UX.
highlights: Designing an intent-based UX instead of prompt-based interaction
Building stance-driven reply tools that feel human
Reducing AI-generic output through prompt discipline and quality checks
Creating a scalable, platform-agnostic writing copilot

projectShowcase.title: Voice AI‚ÄìLed Vendor Data Verification
projectShowcase.description: Led the replacement of manual vendor data verification calls with AI-powered voice calling, automating the confirmation of critical business information (phone numbers, addresses, and operational status) across Justdial‚Äôs vendor ecosystem.
impact: üìû Automated 2L+ verification calls per month
üéØ Achieved ~94% data extraction accuracy
‚úÖ Improved confirmation success to 82% of connected calls (vs ~75% with manual calling)
üí∞ Reduced cost per call from ‚Çπ19 ‚Üí ‚Çπ3.2
üí∏ Delivered ‚Çπ2Cr+ annual cost savings
highlights: Replacing a core manual operational workflow with AI at production scale
Improving both cost efficiency and effectiveness over human-led processes
Designing Voice AI that works across India‚Äôs linguistic diversity
Raising the quality and trustworthiness of Justdial‚Äôs business listings

projectShowcase.title: Speech Analytics for Verification, Growth & Risk Control
projectShowcase.description: Led a speech analytics initiative at Justdial that applied a shared ASR + semantic intelligence pipeline to solve multiple high-impact business problems‚Äîspanning business verification, lead generation, spam control, and operational efficiency.
impact: üìû Millions of calls analysed using a shared speech intelligence approach
üí∞ ‚Çπ3.2 Cr annual savings from TME call verification alone
üí∞ ‚Çπ90L+ additional annual savings from IRO & CS efficiency improvements
üìà +9K leads/day unlocked from non-paid seller calls
üõ°Ô∏è Reduced spam, false closures, and verification errors
üß† Established a risk-aware blueprint for applying LLMs in speech analytics
highlights: Solving multiple business problems with one coherent architectural mindset
Designing evidence-first verification instead of black-box classification
Knowing when not to use an LLM
Balancing accuracy, explainability, cost, and scale

projectShowcase.title: Multilingual Pages for Regional Growth
projectShowcase.description: Led the build and scale of robust multilingual pages at Justdial to expand reach across India‚Äôs regional-language internet users. The initiative focused on creating SEO-friendly, scalable, and high-quality experiences across 6 Indian regional languages, significantly improving organic discovery and user engagement.
impact: üåç Launched multilingual pages across 6 Indian regional languages
üìà Drove 5M+ monthly organic traffic from regional-language search
üîç Improved discovery and engagement for non-English users
üöÄ Expanded Justdial‚Äôs reach into regional geographies and user segments
üß± Established a scalable foundation for future language and localization expansion
highlights: Building a scalable multilingual growth system, not just translated pages
Balancing SEO performance with translation quality at scale
Unlocking regional growth without fragmenting the core product
Creating a framework that continues to compound organic traffic over time

projectShowcase.title: Vin OMS 2.0 ‚Äî Zero-to-One Unified Commerce Platform
projectShowcase.description: Owned the zero-to-one build of Vin OMS 2.0 under the Unified Vinculum initiative, reimagining OMS as a standalone, modular, API-first platform that acts as the central brain of unified commerce, aligned with global OMS market trends.
impact: üöÄ Enabled standalone OMS monetization independent of WMS
üìà Improved scalability for enterprise omnichannel retailers (100+ locations)
‚ö° Reduced ops and engineering friction via config-driven orchestration
üîÆ Established a future-ready platform aligned with unified commerce growth
highlights: Leading a true zero-to-one platform rebuild
Making early architecture and GTM trade-offs that unlocked new markets
Enforcing product vs customization boundaries to keep the core scalable
Building a platform designed for long-term growth, not just features

projectShowcase.title: Skechers ‚Äî Omnichannel Retail Transformation
projectShowcase.description: Led implementing an omnichannel solution that unified inventory across warehouses and physical stores, enabling customers to order out-of-stock items via endless aisle and supporting BOPIS and ship-from-store workflows.
impact: üöÄ ~15% increase in sales through better inventory visibility
‚ö° Average delivery time reduced from ~2 weeks to <1 day by shipping from nearest stores
üì¶ Unified inventory across e-commerce and retail stores
üõçÔ∏è Improved in-store and no-touch shopping experience
highlights: Solving a real revenue leakage problem without relying on discounts
Enabling physical stores to actively contribute to online growth
Driving a massive delivery speed improvement through smarter fulfillment logic
Building a solution that worked reliably at national retail scale

quote.text: On Behalf of Skechers, I am very thankful to Sumit Karranji... for reaching out to us whenever needed and ensuring a successful implementation of the project. I am equally delighted with the diligent effort of the Project team - admirably led by Amit Mohan along with Rishabh Patre and Harshad Vagdoda to develop a custom reconciliation platform.
quote.author: Sachin Borakhade

projectShowcase.title: COCO Group ‚Äî End-to-End Inventory and Order Orchestration
projectShowcase.description: Led the implementation of an end-to-end omnichannel retail and order management solution that unified marketplaces, webstores, warehouses, stores, and 3PL partners under a centralized OMS, enabling seamless order orchestration, inventory visibility, and multi-format fulfillment.
impact: üöÄ Unified inventory and order management across warehouses, small FCs, and retail stores
‚ö° Faster and more accurate order fulfillment through intelligent order routing
üè¨ Enabled store-led fulfillment and endless aisle for improved in-store conversion
üîÑ Centralized returns, refunds, and payment reconciliation across channels
üìä Improved operational visibility with centralized analytics and reporting
highlights: Delivering a complex, end-to-end omnichannel transformation for a large grocery retailer
Orchestrating integrations across marketplaces, webstores, stores, warehouses, and 3PLs
Building a platform capable of handling high-frequency grocery orders at scale
Creating a future-ready architecture supporting loyalty, promotions, and seller enablement
Seeing the system operate reliably across multiple retail formats and fulfillment models

quote.text: Appreciation to Rishabh Patre and the Vinculum team for the successful implementation of our omnichannel project. The team showed strong product thinking, excellent presence of mind, and a clear understanding of retail operations. A pleasure working with them.
quote.author: Pak Soni
